import { Loader } from 'rsuite' import React from 'react' import { Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Gauge } from 'lucide-react' const Estimate = ({distance, setDistance, passagers,setPassagers, bagages, setBagages, calculerTarif,calculEnCours}) => { const style = { boxShadow: "none", outline: "none" } return (
setDistance(e.target.value)} style={style} />
) } export default Estimate
